SEARCH
Package gw.cc.aggregatelimit.entity

Interface AggregateLimit

public interface AggregateLimit
AggregateLimit An annual or lifetime aggregate limit on a policy or coverage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    configurationAppliesTo(Transaction transaction)
    Checks the aggregate limit configuration in aggregatelimitused-config.xml and determines whether this aggregate limit applies to the given transaction.
    ClaimAggregateLimitRpt[]
    getApplicableClaimAggregateLimitRpts()
    Returns the list of ClaimAggregateLimitRpts that pertain to this limit.
    ClaimAggregateLimitRpt[]
    getApplicableNonZeroClaimAggregateLimitRpts()
    Returns the list of non-zero ClaimAggregateLimitRpts that pertain to this limit.
    Currency
    getClaimCurrency()
    Currency of any Claim in the PolicyPeriod.
    String
    getCoverageNames()
    Returns a concatenation of the names of the coverage lines on this limit separated by commas and with the format: CoverageLine.CoverageSubtype #CoverageLine.ExposureUnitNumber.
    String
    getFinancialsCalculationDescription()
    This is determined by the Policy Type of the Aggregate Limit's PolicyPeriod, for Policy-Level limits
    CurrencyAmount
    getLimitRemaining()
    Return the remaining unused amount of this aggregate limit.
    CurrencyAmount
    getLimitUsed()
    Returns the amount used (a.k.a. realized) of this aggregate limit, in ClaimCurrency.

  • Method Details

    • getLimitUsed

      CurrencyAmount getLimitUsed()
      Returns the amount used (a.k.a. realized) of this aggregate limit, in ClaimCurrency.

    • getLimitRemaining

      CurrencyAmount getLimitRemaining()
      Return the remaining unused amount of this aggregate limit. Specifically, this amount is equal to the limit amount minus the amount used. If the difference is negative, then zero is returned.

    • configurationAppliesTo

      boolean configurationAppliesTo(Transaction transaction)
      Checks the aggregate limit configuration in aggregatelimitused-config.xml and determines whether this aggregate limit applies to the given transaction. This method only checks the configuration, so even if it returns true it is possible that the limit won't apply to the transaction for other reasons (e.g. if the limit's coverage lines exclude the transaction).

      This method is typically only used when implementing the IAggregateLimitTransactionPlugin

      Parameters:
      transaction - a non null transaction
      Returns:
      true if the aggregate limit configuration specifies that this aggregate limit should apply to the given transaction

    • getApplicableClaimAggregateLimitRpts

      ClaimAggregateLimitRpt[] getApplicableClaimAggregateLimitRpts()
      Returns the list of ClaimAggregateLimitRpts that pertain to this limit.

    • getApplicableNonZeroClaimAggregateLimitRpts

      ClaimAggregateLimitRpt[] getApplicableNonZeroClaimAggregateLimitRpts()
      Returns the list of non-zero ClaimAggregateLimitRpts that pertain to this limit.

    • getCoverageNames

      String getCoverageNames()
      Returns a concatenation of the names of the coverage lines on this limit separated by commas and with the format: CoverageLine.CoverageSubtype #CoverageLine.ExposureUnitNumber.
      Returns:
      A String containing the concatenated coverage lines information.

    • getClaimCurrency

      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Currency of any Claim in the PolicyPeriod. They should all have same currency, if an AggLimit exists. If the AggLimit's PolicyPeriod is null (i.e. the limit is new or being edited), the default system currency is returned.

    • getFinancialsCalculationDescription

      String getFinancialsCalculationDescription()
      This is determined by the Policy Type of the Aggregate Limit's PolicyPeriod, for Policy-Level limits
      Returns:
      Localized description of the calculation type for this Aggregate Limit, null for Account level limits because there is no guaranteed single policy type involved.
